item.title: Liz application of Clarke's Law to Hanlon's Razor
item.description: "Any sufficiently advanced incompetence is indistinguishable from malice." -- Elizabeth Mattijsen <liz@dijkmat.nl> Liz just applied Clarke's 3rd Law to Hanlon's Razor.
